card-pl-1.title: Competitive analysis — feature gap report
card-pl-1.description: Compare our v2.0 feature set against Notion, Linear, and Monday.com. Focus on collaboration, real-time sync, and mobile support.

card-pl-2.title: User interview synthesis — power users
card-pl-2.description: Analyze 12 user interviews. Key themes: need for keyboard shortcuts, better search, and team collaboration. Write up findings doc.

card-pl-3.title: Define v2.0 success metrics & KPIs
card-pl-3.description: Target: 40% increase in weekly active users, <2s page load, 4.5+ app store rating. Get sign-off from product lead.

card-pl-4.title: Design system refresh — color palette & typography
card-pl-4.description: Update design tokens for the new brand direction. Ensure WCAG AA contrast ratios. Deliver Figma library update.

card-pl-5.title: Prototype real-time collaboration UI
card-pl-5.description: Interactive Figma prototype showing cursor presence, live card updates, and conflict resolution flow. Include 3 user testing scenarios.

card-pl-6.title: Implement SSE-based real-time sync
card-pl-6.description: Server-Sent Events for board updates. Version-based conflict detection with 409 responses. Exponential backoff reconnection.

card-pl-7.title: Keyboard navigation & shortcuts
card-pl-7.description: Arrow keys for card/list navigation, Tab between lists, Enter to open, Space to toggle, N for new card, ? for help overlay.

card-pl-8.title: Drag-and-drop improvements — cross-list & reorder
card-pl-8.description: Support dragging cards between lists and reordering lists via drag handle. Smooth animations with CSS transitions.

card-pl-9.title: Timeline / Gantt view with drag resize
card-pl-9.description: Horizontal timeline showing cards with date ranges. Drag to move, resize handles for start/end dates. Today marker line.

card-pl-10.title: E2E test suite — Playwright
card-pl-10.description: Cover critical flows: create board, add/move/complete cards, drag-and-drop, keyboard shortcuts, real-time sync between tabs.

card-pl-11.title: Performance audit — Lighthouse & Core Web Vitals
card-pl-11.description: Target: LCP < 1.5s, CLS < 0.1, FID < 100ms. Profile with React DevTools, fix any re-render bottlenecks.

card-pl-12.title: Write launch blog post & changelog
card-pl-12.description: Highlight: real-time collab, keyboard shortcuts, timeline view, performance improvements. Include GIFs for key features.

card-pl-13.title: Update demo environment with sample data
card-pl-13.description: Create 3 demo boards: Product Launch, Sales Pipeline, and Japanese localization showcase. Seed script for easy reset.

card-pl-14.title: Prepare investor demo script — 5 min walkthrough
card-pl-14.description: Flow: board overview → create card → drag between lists → open timeline → show real-time sync (2 tabs) → keyboard shortcuts.

card-pl-15.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline — GitHub Actions
card-pl-15.description: Lint, type-check, unit tests, build. Auto-deploy to Vercel on main branch push. Badge in README.

card-pl-16.title: Board CRUD API — file-based storage
card-pl-16.description: REST API: GET/PUT/DELETE /api/board/[id], GET /api/board for listing. JSON file storage in data/boards/.

card-pl-17.title: Card labels with custom naming
card-pl-17.description: 6 color labels (green, yellow, orange, red, purple, blue) with user-editable names per board. Show on cards and in detail modal.
